content.rendered:
We created this simple guide to help give you a general idea of what plan will likely work best for you and your household. Pick a plan based mainly on what you will be doing with your devices, not just how many you have. Choose the speed that best matches the activities you will be doing at one time:

5-10 Mbps

  • Email
  • Basic web surfing

10-25 Mbps

  • Streaming HD TV

25-50 Mbps

  • VoIP service
  • Working from home with a VPN
  • Streaming 4K TV

50-75 Mbps

  • Gaming
  • Smart home
  • Streaming 4K TV & using a smartphone
  • Working from home with a VPN & VoIP service

75-100 Mbps

  • Smart home with security cameras
  • Smart home & TV streaming
  • Smart home & gaming
  • Working from home with a VPN & streaming TV

100-150 Mbps

  • Gaming & streaming TV simultaneously
  • In-home server: as much speed as possible
Close
